title: Drawing, "Drawing of Hood and Trim", November 18, 1960
markings: Stamped in black ink, lower right: DISPLAY FILE.
inscribed: Printed in black ink, lower right: NO. CHANGE DATE NO. ISSUED TO DATE / CLIENT / TITLE / HENRY DREYFUSS / NEW YORK – 4 WEST 58TH STREET, NEW YORK 19 / CALIFORNIA – 500 COLUMBIA STREET, SOUTH PASADENA / DRAWN APPROVED DATE SCALE DRAWING NO. Inscribed in graphite, upper right: FRONT OF HOOD FLANGED, / NOTCHED, & PUNCHED TO / RECEIVE EDGE MOLDING. / CORNER REINFORCEMENTS / SPOT WELDED IN; center right: BOTYL RUBBER TRIM STRIP, / FRONT AND SIDES; center: MOLDED JOINT HERE; left: SIDE STRIPES MOLDED WITH RAISED LETTERING, THEN / STRIPS USED AS INSERTS IN FRONT MOLDING DIE / MAKING SIDES AND FRONT ONE CONTINUOUS STRIP. / RAISED LETTERS ROLLER PAINTED, MOLDING APPLIED TO / FINISHED & PAINTED HOOD.; lower left: PULL THROUGH STUD FASTENINGS / MOLDED AS INTEGREL PART OF / TRIM STRIP HOLES PUNCHED IN / HOOD TO RECEIVE STUDS. / SECT. A-A SECT. B-B; lower right: R&E / HOOD & TRIM DETAIL / TE (?) TE (?) 11-18-60 NONE CS60-5.
description: Detail drawing of hood and trim of John Deere tractor.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawing of Hood and Trim", November 18, 1960.
November 18, 1960. Graphite on tracing tissue. Gift of Henry Dreyfuss. 1972-88-366.
